    • Constructor Detail

      • JCSMPTimerQueueImpl

        public JCSMPTimerQueueImpl()

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeToNext

        public long getTimeToNext(long curTime)
        Returns number of milliseconds to next timer expiry, or -1 if no timers are scheduled. Returned value will be 0 if a timer was due to expire in the past.
        Parameters:
        curTime - Time to use as current time.
        Returns:
        Milliseconds until the next scheduled timer.

      • runAllTo

        public void runAllTo(long targetTime)
        Runs all timers until targetTime. If two timers are scheduled for the same target time, the order in which they will run is indeterminate.
        Parameters:
        targetTime - Time to use as target.

      • cancelTimer

        public void cancelTimer(JCSMPTimer timer)
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Cancel a specific timer. It is legal to attempt to cancel a timer not currently scheduled; such a call has no effect.
        Specified by:
        cancelTimer in interface JCSMPTimerQueue
        Parameters:
        timer - Timer to cancel.

      • cancelAllTimers

        public void cancelAllTimers()
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Cancel all scheduled timers. (Warning - Dangerous!)
        Specified by:
        cancelAllTimers in interface JCSMPTimerQueue

      • schedule_relative

        public JCSMPTimer schedule_relative(long offset,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Schedule a timer for a relative time in the future.
        Specified by:
        schedule_relative in interface JCSMPTimerQueue
        Parameters:
        offset - Relative time offset (milliseconds).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result

      • schedule_absolute

        public JCSMPTimer schedule_absolute(long time,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Description copied from interface: JCSMPTimerQueue
        Schedule a timer for an absolute time in the future.
        Specified by:
        schedule_absolute in interface JCSMPTimerQueue
        Parameters:
        time - Absolute time at which the timer should expire (same format as returned by System.currentTimeMillis()).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result
